trans-unit.source: Converts from a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"></xref> object to an object of another data type and from another type to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"></xref> object.
Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.UnitConverter> class to convert a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> to an object of another data type.
You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.UnitConverter> class to convert an object of another data type to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>.
This converter can convert only a string to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> to a string.
You should never access a type converter directly.
Instead, call the appropriate converter by using <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor?displayProperty=fullName>.
For more information, see the examples in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter?displayProperty=fullName> base class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.UnitConverter"></xref> class.
Returns a value indicating whether the unit converter can convert from the specified source type.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> instance that specifies the context of the object to convert.
The type of the source.
`true` if the source type can be converted from; otherwise, `false`.
Returns a value indicating whether the converter can convert a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"></xref> object to the specified type.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that indicates the context of the object to convert.
The <xref href="System.Type"></xref> that represents the data type to convert to.
`true` if the converter supports converting a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"></xref> object to the destination type; otherwise, `false`.
Performs type conversion from the specified context, object, and argument list.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> instance that indicates the context of the object to convert.
A <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref> object that represents information about a culture such as language, calendar system, and so on.
This parameter is not used in this method.
It is reserved for future versions of this method.
You can optionally pass `null` for this parameter.
The object to convert.
The object resulting from conversion.
Performs type conversion to the specified destination type given the specified context, object and argument list.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> instance that indicates the context of the object to convert.
A <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref> object that represents information about a culture such as language, calendar system, and so on.
This parameter is not used in this method.
It is reserved for future versions of this method.
You can optionally pass `null` for this parameter.
The object to convert.
The type to convert to.
The object resulting from conversion.
